attributes.additional_details: Basically as everyone knows there are simply not enough staff nor is there the money made available by the Government to provide an effective National Health Service. What I propose is that everyone who can will pay £1 a week through payroll that goes directly to the NHS without any form of Government intervention. I know we all pay insurance but we don't have a say where it goes. This way we can save the NHS no matter who is in Government. Help save it, you may need it.
